name: Light Venomoth
author: Masako Yamashita
flavor_text: It defends itself by flapping its wings at high speed, spreading poisonous powder throughout the air.

attacks.name: Mysterious Wing
attacks.effect: Your opponent may choose a Baby Pokémon, Basic Pokémon, or Evolution card from his or her discard pile and put it into his or her hand. Either way, you may do the same.

attacks.name: Synchronize
attacks.effect: If Light Venomoth and the Defending Pokémon have a different number of Energy cards attached to them, this attack does nothing.
